title: Kuiba III: Zhanshen Jueqi
alternative_title: Kuiba 3: Mars Rising, God of War Rising, Ares Rise, Kuiba 3, 魁拔III：战神崛起
description: Before he can get close to the real enemy, Manji faces challenges from two powerful opponents : Da Cang - a master of using body pulse, and Hai Wen Xiang - a sea witch who is extremely loyal to Kuiba. When Manji is unwillingly engaged in an intense battle with Hai Wen Xiang. Kuiba reveals its mysterious appearance.
